snippet: The disgraced lobbyist, out of prison and on a book tour, tells a reform-minded crowd he won't divulge all he knows because he doesn't want to put anyone else behind bars.
abstract: The disgraced lobbyist, out of prison and on a book tour, tells a reform-minded crowd he won't divulge all he knows because he doesn't want to put anyone else behind bars.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- Jack Abramoff hinted Monday that he knows of still more skeletons that are buried on Capitol Hill, but he's not saying where.

headline.main: Jack Abramoff Hints at Untold Scandals
